name: Paramedic Simulator
storyline:
You’re responsible for emergencies and ambulance transport across your city - and in a city full of people, a lot can go wrong! 
 
On a good day, that might be nothing more than a few cuts and bruises or a sports injury, but on a bad day you might have to cope with a major motorway pile-up, industrial accidents or a gas leak from a local factory. Whatever the situation, the paramedics have got to be there, and it’s up to you to tend to the sick and get the seriously wounded to hospital.
summary:
Emergency, rescue & first aid. 
 
Get ready for a huge variety of challenges and scenarios - varying difficulty levels and unpredictable weather conditions and technical factors will make your job even harder! Numerous minigames (quizzes, hidden objects, reaction tests) add to the gameplay and make Paramedic Simulator a challenge for the whole family.
